xwikidoc.name: NavigationMenu
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="xwiki:RISCOSSPlatformCode.Macros"/}}{{velocity}} $xwiki.jsx.use("xwiki:RISCOSSPlatformCode.Create") ## Needed for the XWiki.RISCOSSPlatform.initializeCreateDialog callback $xwiki.jsx.use("xwiki:RISCOSSPlatformCode.ShowInDialog") ## #set($mainWikiId = $services.wiki.mainWikiId) ## #set($currentWikiId = $services.wiki.currentWikiId) ## ## #if($mainWikiId == $currentWikiId) * **$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.domainManager")** #else #set($wikiName = $services.wiki.getById($services.wiki.getCurrentWikiId()).prettyName) * $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.domain") **$wikiName** #end ## #if(!$isGuest) #if($mainWikiId != $currentWikiId) #set($scopes = $services.query.xwql("SELECT doc.fullName, doc.title FROM Document doc, doc.object(RISCOSSPlatformScopeManagerCode.ScopeClass) as scope WHERE doc.space = 'RISCOSSPlatformScopes'").execute()) * $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager") ** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformScopes", "template": "xwiki:RISCOSSPlatformScopeManagerCode.ScopeTemplate", "linkLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.newScope"), "dialogTitle": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.newScope"), "fieldLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.scopeName") }) ** $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.newEntity") #foreach($scope in $scopes) *** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformEntities", "template": "${scope[0]}Template", "linkLabel": $scope[1], "dialogTitle": "$services.localization.render('riscossPlatform.scopeManager.createEntity.title') $scope[1]", "fieldLabel": "$services.localization.render('riscossPlatform.scopeManager.createEntity.entityName', $scope[1])" }) #end ** ---- ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.scopeIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformScopes.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.entityIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformEntities.WebHome]] * $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager")
** Models *** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.riskConfiguration")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurationManagerCode.CreateRiskConfiguration||queryString="xpage=plain" class="openDialog" title="$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.createRiskConfiguration.title")" callback="XWiki.RISCOSSPlatform.initializeCreateRiskConfigurationDialog"]] *** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.goalModel")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurationManagerCode.CreateGoalModel||queryString="xpage=plain" class="openDialog" title="$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.createGoalModel.title")" callback="XWiki.RISCOSSPlatform.initializeCreateGoalModelDialog"]] * View ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.scopes")>>RISCOSSPlatformScopes.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.scopeManager.entities")>>RISCOSSPlatformEntities.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.riskConfigurations")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurations.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.goalModels")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurations.WebHome]] #end #end {{/velocity}}
